sentences.en: A choppy or stilted gaIt'should be penalized.
sentences.cn: 起伏不定的、呆板不自然的步态属于缺陷.

sentences.en: A gale was blowing and the sea was choppy.
sentences.cn: 狂风大作，海面上波浪起伏。

sentences.en: Audio Quality Enhancements Eliminates instances of choppy audio experienced by some users.
sentences.cn: 音频质量增强消除了波涛汹涌的声音有些用户所经历的实例.

sentences.en: Choppy water trying to splash in your mouth on every breath.
sentences.cn: 每次呼吸都有波涛冲进你的嘴巴中.

sentences.en: Highly leveraged funds sink quickly in such choppy markets.
sentences.cn: 高级杠杆基金很快陷入这样的牛皮市中.

sentences.en: It was a stiff pull and even within the reef the sea was choppy.
sentences.cn: 这一段水路可真难划,甚至在礁脉之内也是波涛滚滚.

sentences.en: So a pretty good chance a choppy tape tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 因此今天大盘强烈震荡的可能性很大.

sentences.en: The choppy waves made handling the boats a tricky operation that day.
sentences.cn: 那天在滔滔的波浪里驾驶小舟着实费了一番手脚.

sentences.en: The muddy water has a choppy and irregular surface.
sentences.cn: 泥水表面波浪滔滔且不规则.
大海开始变得波涛起伏.

sentences.en: The sea was choppy today because of the wind.
sentences.cn: 今天有风,海上波涛汹涌.

sentences.en: The sea was choppy today because of the windstorm.
sentences.cn: 今天起了风暴,海上波涛汹涌.

sentences.en: The small boat bobbed about on the choppy water.
sentences.cn: 小船在波浪起伏的水面上颠簸。

sentences.en: When you're out on the water, you've got to contend with a choppy and unpredictable sea.
sentences.cn: 当你离开水域, 你要承受惊涛骇浪,征服未知海域.

sentences.en: You can forget them in wavy choppy water.
sentences.cn: 在波浪汹涌的水面上,你忘了这个动作吧.

trans.tran_en: Can be used to describe water when there are a lot of small waves on it because there is a wind blowing.
